column9: Delicious burger! Went for the classic with sweet potato fries, all round good taste. It’s definitely worth a visit if you’re craving that juicy burger :)

We were here with a group of 25 persons. The waitress was shocked but she quickly took all our orders.
Because the number of persons it took a while before everyone had his order.
But that was no problem. 
The food was ok and I...More

Slow service, maybe it was a busy day but it took more than 30 min to get a slightly cold, under seasoned crumbly meat patty that fell apart.
Not to mention the garlic fries where soaked in a lot of garlic butter no garlic whatsoever....More

I had a chili burger: eating it, I noticed that the emphasis was on the sauce/cheese rather than the meat, which wasn't much and wasn't particularly tasty. Just slightly better than a chain fast-food.
All in all ok, but not a place I'll come again,...More

Shady Burgers in Lund was a great place that the three of us (2 parents and a 10 year old kid) loved.  We first spotted it whilst strolling around Lund and then returned to eat a couple of days later and were not disappointed.  Lovely...More

It can feel a bit crowded to eat at Shady Burgers as the restaurant offers limited amount of seating space. One has to come in good time to get a place and to not end up sitting just next to other people because there is...More
Avoid this place. Ordered from hungrig.se. They forgot the dip sauce and the burger for 100+ sek was just bread, meat and a small piece of cheese. Like McDonalds but 10x the price
Not dry at all ... to contradict whatever was said before. Got the food quickly . Their own beer is also very tasty.

column7: Great burgers, nice staff. A good competitor to Tugg Burgers
column9:
Tugg burgers, watch out since this is a good competitor in Lund.

Stopped for some lunch and went for the cheese burger which was great. 
If you’re in Lund, looking for a good burger, this is where you should go!
